Name: Northern Territory University Information Services Division

About.Hours & facilities: Closed access. A retrieval service is available.

About.Acquisition focus: Material covering all aspects of Northern Australia and contiguous maritime and land areas, and Eastern Indonesia.

About.Major holdings: Aboriginal language readers. NTU Theses. NT Administrator's Reports 1879-1972. Photograph Collection (over 5,000 photographs). NT newspapers and indexes. Material relating to East Timor during the Portuguese period.

Contact.Postal address: NTU Library, PO Box 41246, Casuarina, NT 0811
